title: One Piece: Long Ring Long Land-hen

synonyms: One Piece: Long Ring Long Land Arc - A One Night Abridged Special
One Piece: Long Ring Long Land-hen - Ichiya Kagiri no Tokubetsu Henshuu-ban
alternative_titles.en: One Piece: Long Ring Long Land Arc
alternative_titles.ja: ワンピース～ロングリングロングランド編～ 一夜限りの特別編集版

synopsis: A 75-minute recap of episodes 207-219, covering the Long Ring Long Land Arc. It was only aired once and was never released on home video.
